vsParam:
... Well, we have some time left. After that inspiring speech from
the Headmaster, I'm going to give you all an additional assignment.

What?! That's a bit unnecessary...
[px], you agree with me, right!?

I disagree. [px] is a model student
who is hardworking and dedicated to alchemy.

Surely a student like [px] would not be bothered by a bit of extra work?
Isn't that right, [px]?

You're not giving [px] any other choice!
[px] is just being polite!

Don't make it sound so bad.
Hmm, all right...

Some ingredients [c][DF1FB2FF]can only be gained[-][/c] by killing monsters.
I would like you all to go out and gather such ingredients.

Eh, monsters?
You want us to fight monsters?

Yes, that's right. There're monsters known as [c][DF1FB2FF]Wolves[-][/c] in the Lost Woods.
Go and collect a "Beast Skin" dropped by these monsters.

I've already taught you the basics of battle, you may go now...
Everyone, please be careful.
